summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 57758, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property for street purposes at the intersection of 10th Avenue South and Kenyon Street and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law," approved June 18, 1929.
